text:
myself and the boys. The fact that you feel entitled with no sense of embarrassment, or remorse.  That aspect will move forward in path my lawyer
outlined. I have undeniable proof that will come out as you push your narrative and deny but your choice.
If you thought I was monitoring you in the Tesla, check log ins. Only times you will see is the evening you burst into the Kirkland house demanding I
use it to unlock the car and when you called me at work asking for the same as you locked yourself out at a local Sbux. I was unaware of the tracking
feature. Furthermore, you control all access and permission settings so I assume you could have deleted me at anytime. Please do so. I have deleted the
app.
Please let your lawyer tell mine any other way you believe I am tracking you.
You monitoring me can be proven despite what you may think.
Message 393 of 4024
Can we chat? I would like to pick up where we left off please and be civil about it. I did apologize for saying shut up
Sent:01/14/2024 at 11:41 AM
From:Robert Moyer
To:Christine Moyer (First Viewed: 01/14/2024 at 11:43 AM)
Subject:Re: Language and tone
Message 394 of 4024
I’d like to discuss size, time, logistics. I need to be able to receive on my end too. So let’s close on this please. We can be nice. Let’s please stick to the
topic and not poke each other.. deal?
Sent:01/14/2024 at 11:45 AM
From:Robert Moyer
To:Christine Moyer (First Viewed: 01/14/2024 at 11:50 AM)
Subject:Re: Monday lugg
Message 395 of 4024
I can’t book it till we discuss please
Sent:01/14/2024 at 11:49 AM
From:Robert Moyer
To:Christine Moyer (First Viewed: 01/14/2024 at 11:50 AM)
Subject:Re: Monday lugg
Message 396 of 4024
No. I can’t given my knowledge that you are actually accusing me of monitoring you and are adamant in denial for surveillance. It is too traumatizing
and triggering. You have treated me with disrespect in these emails as I outlined below, in your texts and calls .
You continue to believe I can be treated differently than other humans. Can be abused, disrespected and my rights violated with consequences.
Nothing left to discuss on move other than scheduling the lugg.
Given where we are, it is going to get very uncomfortable and expensive between us. That is your choice given how you chose to behave and
subsequent response.
Sent:01/14/2024 at 11:50 AM
From:Christine Moyer
To:Robert Moyer (First Viewed: 01/14/2024 at 11:50 AM)
Subject:Re: Language and tone
